channel.title: HangOvers
channel.description:
There is only one way to avoid them; Abstinence of the drink, but why put yourself through that?
When I wake up after a cruise I usually feel like absolute shit, no headache just constant nausea. But only after an assload of drinking do I feel upset in the morning.
What about yourselves?

item.title: HangOvers
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

I found that Gatorade (or Powerade) is much better than water for stopping hangovers. If you can remember it is best to drink a bottle before you pass out.

Ah, replenishing those electrylotes, one watery beverage at a time. Just remember that if you drink too much you get cancer.

Read full topic

I found that Gatorade (or Powerade) is much better than water for stopping hangovers. If you can remember it is best to drink a bottle before you pass out.

(Everclear is illegal in ohio too, but I’m drinking Bacardi 151 right now, its just about as good <3)

The best hangover cure is a couple of pints of cola and a couple of joints. Nothing beats it.

item.title: HangOvers
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

If you actually remember to drink a lot water while getting drunk, you aren't most likely going to get a hangover the next day anyways.

Quoted for truth, if your pausing to drink water, you aren’t partying right. Nobodies going to want water in the beer bong.

Read full topic

i hate them and i tried to sleep though all of them but failed the headaches were fuckin annoying and painfull :mad: and i think i took to much panadol on my first

item.title: HangOvers
item.dc:creator: @kmb Kmb
item.description:
@kmb wrote:

1m 3m0:

i saw this program (whats good for you) and they tested the best way to prevent a hangover besides not getting drunk and the best was to have a glass of water after every bottle of beer or shot of alcoholic substance and you’ll be fine (apparently)

If you actually remember to drink a lot water while getting drunk, you aren’t most likely going to get a hangover the next day anyways.

Read full topic

item.title: HangOvers
item.dc:creator: @Cheesehunk Cheesehunk
item.description:
@Cheesehunk wrote:

The best cure for a Hang over is ultimately, not to get drunk. However, no one here will follow that, so my favourite solution is to take 2 Advils and a glass of water right before you go to sleep.

Read full topic

item.title: HangOvers
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

The 190 proof is illegal in my state (michigan) which is like 95% pure, but the 151 proof isn't (75%) Either way that shit is ridiculous, I'd rather have two shots of vodka then 1 shot of everclear :-P

Yeah, I agree. In fact, for everyday drunkeness I prefer good old beer. As I said, everclear is best used for Green Dragon.

Read full topic

item.title: HangOvers
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

I always thought you boiled it with vodka Tongue Your way sounds way cooler though lol Tongue

I have never made it before, but I’ve heard stories.

Well, I’ve known people who boiled the weed in butter, while pouring vodka over the sautee. It makes some really fucking bomb brownies. But I like using extra virgin olive oil for brownies myself. As for green dragon, cold and lack of light help speed the chemical bonding process of the alcohol+thc.

Well come on man! What do I need?

Uh, a tolerance for hard alcohol?

Read full topic

item.title: HangOvers
item.dc:creator: @Sleep Sleep
item.description:
@Sleep wrote:

PaulT:

[quote]Hell I’ll join him!

Unless you’re properly prepared, you will probably burn a hole in your tongue.[/quote]

Well come on man! What do I need?

Read full topic

item.title: HangOvers
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“PaulT, post:17, topic:43657”]Don’t boil weed in alcohol :D.

If you want to do some weed cooking you can use vegetable oil or butter.

To make green dragon just put a whole lot of stems and leaves, or nug if you can afford it (I usually put half an 0 into a handle of everclear) into some high proof alcohol and leave it in a cool dark place for a few months.[/quote]
I always thought you boiled it with vodka Your way sounds way cooler though lol

I have never made it before, but I’ve heard stories.

Read full topic

item.title: HangOvers
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

Don’t boil weed in alcohol :D.

If you want to do some weed cooking you can use vegetable oil or butter.

To make green dragon just put a whole lot of stems and leaves, or nug if you can afford it (I usually put half an 0 into a handle of everclear) into some high proof alcohol and leave it in a cool dark place for a few months.

Read full topic

item.title: HangOvers
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“PaulT, post:15, topic:43657”][quote author=jme_009 link=topic=60687.msg732599#msg732599 date=1167904047]
I tried everclear, not sure if it was the real stuff or not, but the second it hit my tongue I couldn’t breathe for about 20 seconds.
[/quote]

Yeah. I only use it to make Green Dragon, except on special occasions when I’ll mix a little with alot of pepsi-cola and fruit punch.[/quote]

I thought green dragon was made with vodka? And holy shit I’d be careful when boiling everclear

Read full topic
